summary.para: Represents a mapping between a C data type and an XML attribute.
The local name of the XML attribute.
The namespace of the XML attribute.
The type that corresponds to the XML attribute.
Not all types support being read and written as attributes. If the documentation for the indicates it supports , then it can be used with this structure.
Additional information about the type. Each type has a different description structure. This may be NULL, depending on the .
